thread.title_full: WATCH: Is This President Mahama's Toughest Interview Ever? - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: WATCH: Is This President Mahama's Toughest Interview Ever?
text: President John Dramani Mahama's recent interview with DW TV's "Conflict Zone" is trending on various social media. Discussing a wide-range of issues in Africa and Ghana, host, Tim Sebastian asked the president some tough questions which he dealt with appropriately. President Mahama was lauded by the West for maintaining a stable democracy in an otherwise volatile region. Watch Video:
